item.title: Converting HTML to a PDF using Python, AWS Lambda, and wkhtmltopdf
item.description: Building an AWS lambda function that uses Python and wkhtmltopdf to convert an HTML file to a PDF file.
item.dc:creator: Bradley Schoeneweis

item.title: Rebuilding my blog from scratch with Next.js
item.description: Rebuilding my blog from a Gatsby.js templated site to a custom Next.js site from scratch.
item.dc:creator: Bradley Schoeneweis

item.title: Visualizing your LinkedIn connections using Python
item.description: Using Python's Pandas, NetworkX, and pyvis to understand and visualize companies within a directly connected LinkedIn network.
item.dc:creator: Bradley Schoeneweis

item.title: Setting up a Slack webhook for simple notifications
item.description: Setting up a Slack webhook to send plain text or simple HTML notifications to a Slack channel.
item.dc:creator: Bradley Schoeneweis
